snippet: With many of the performance spaces used by the Spoleto Festival USA already spiffed up, the biggest project of all is about to start: a $142 million renovation of the Gaiilard Municipal Auditorium, with costs split between the City of Charleston and...
abstract: With many of the performance spaces used by the Spoleto Festival USA already spiffed up, the biggest project of all is about to start: a $142 million renovation of the Gaiilard Municipal Auditorium, with costs split between the City of Charleston and private donors.

headline.main: For Charleston and Spoleto, It's Clean Up, Paint Up, Fix Up Time Once Again
